titleStmt.title: Tal Ilan Lexicon, Master List -- Gaius-Gaius

state.note: Graffito on brick, Villa Torlonia, Beyer & Lietzman
Julius (27) Aretas (1), Gaius (26) Julius (28) Candidus (2)’s son
Julius (28) Candidus (2), Gaius (25) Julius (27) Aretas (1)’s father
Vetulenus (1) Melissus (1), Marcia (10) Curtia (1) Euodia (4)’s husband, Gaius (38) Vetulenus (2) Euodus (5)’s father
Vetulenus (2) Euodus (5), Gaius (37) Vetulenus (1) Melissus (1)’s son, aged 22
